newsitem.title: USA: Kirby expects Q4 charge for reorganization.
newsitem.headline: Kirby expects Q4 charge for reorganization.

text.p: Kirby Corp, a marine transportation company, said on Tuesday it plans to post a charge of between $0.02 and $0.03 per share in the fourth quarter for reorganization costs.
Once the reorganization is complete, the company said, it believes it will be able to achieve annual cost savings of between $0.30 and $0.40 per share, phased in over a three-year period.
In the past 18 months, the company has been seeking ways to control costs and improve operating efficiencies. It is in the midst of implementing organizational changes toward that end.
